page.title: 13RECREATION IN TARRANT VALLEY
page.content: While I was exploring our block my job was to ask people what they did in their spare time and I got lots of different answers.The grown ups seemed to be the best off.If they didnt want to watch the television they could go out to the Langton Arms pub and have a drink,play skittles or darts.The pub has four skittles and darts teams.Some of the older people went for walks or did gardening as most of the houses had large gardens with lots of flowers and vegetables. The chldren have not so much to do. There is no playing feild or youth club and the nearest youth club is in Blandford.Some have ponies and ride these in their spare time but they must get bored a lot living in the countryside.
